text: When commenting on posts, is there a way to style just the author comments? So when someone comments and the author replies, they have a way to see its the author.

I haven't messed with comments very much, but you can access the contact record on the page. get the email, then search through comments on page using a script, checking for the username/email and then add a class to it, that is styled for the author
only thing i can think of though is if i know the authors email address, i could potentially fake it right?
If the author of the comment has filled out a comment, they should have acontact record
But I have no idea how comments are displayed on page
I see what you are saying
I have never explored the comment object
if it displyas first/last that might work...
i'm sure there will be edge cases where it false positive
